	.ORG 0XA000
;
;	Demo displaying graphics array to the screen
;
M_ADDRESS 	EQU	0X3C00		;Base address of the video memory
BYTE_COUNT	EQU 0X03E8		;The number of charactors on the screen
;
BEGIN:			;HOUSEKEEPING
				CALL	CLR_SCREEN
				LD		HL, M_ADDRESS
				LD		DE, TEXT
				LD		BC, BYTE_COUNT
NXT:			LD		A, (DE)
				LD		(HL), A
				INC		HL
				INC 	DE
				DEC		BC
				LD		A, B
				OR		C
				JP		NZ, NXT
				RET

CLR_SCREEN:		PUSH	HL
				PUSH	DE
				PUSH	BC
				LD		HL, M_ADDRESS	;Load the video address
				LD		DE, BYTE_COUNT	;Load the byte count
NEXT:			LD 		A, 0x00			;Load 0 into all memory locations
				LD 		(HL), A
				INC		HL
				DEC 	DE
				LD  	A, D			;check for zero
				OR 		E
				JP  	NZ, NEXT
				POP		BC
				POP 	DE
				POP 	HL
				RET
